text:
A New World

Sonia hurries down the street, anxious.  
“Good-bye, I will tell Katerina Ivanovna.”  

She glances back, feeling overwhelmed.  
“Only not to-day, please, not to-day!”  

---
An unknown gentleman watches from afar.  
“Who is this Raskolnikov?”  

He observes Sonia's distress, intrigued.  
“Something is unfolding here…”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Sonia feels a mix of anxiety and anticipation as she reflects on her encounter with Raskolnikov, sensing a new world opening before her.
